overview: It is a story of a prominent but an ageing Naxalite leader Kondarudra Seetharamayya, who wants to meet his son who is studying in University as a last wish. Police are in hot pursuit of him as he eliminated a political personality who happens to be the father of Home minister. It is an emotional journey of a father to meet his son whom he has never seen.
title: Maa Nanna Naxalite
